definition: for a particular person, occasion, purpose/focused on one thing/special/expert/particular (to sth)/concentrated/specialized
office/situation/classifier for games: match, set, round etc

sentences.english: The patent office pended the settlement of a patent application.
sentences.chinese: 專利局擱置了一項專利申請。

sentences.english: When Blackboard rejected SFLC's proposal, the SFLC went to the Patent Office and asked that the patent be reexamined .
sentences.chinese: 然後SFLC向美國專利局申請重新審議該專利條款。

sentences.english: A hint is that no lawyer from the Patent Office was listed on the brief.
sentences.chinese: 沒有專利局的律師被列在那摘要裏就是一個暗示。

sentences.english: The trademark is registered on the book of the Patent Office.
sentences.chinese: 該商標已在專利局登記註冊。

sentences.english: In 1902 he went to work as a patent office examiner in Bern .
sentences.chinese: 1902年他到伯恩當上了專利局的鑑定員。

sentences.english: Yet, he refused to conform and was forced to take on a job in a patent office.
sentences.chinese: 但是他卻拒絕隨從主流，而後被迫就職於一個專利局。
